text: ==Events== * January 14 - King Philip V of Spain leaves the throne for his 16-year-old son Louis I. * January 28 - Saint Petersburg State University is established. * February 8 - Catherine I of Russia is officially named czarina by her husband, Peter the Great. * May 29 - Pope Benedict XIII succeeds Pope Innocent XIII as the 245th pope. * June 23 - Treaty of Constantinople is signed * April 22 â€“ Immanuel Kant
